Version 2.0.1 (05/09/2011)
 * Added a new GRLDR version
 * Added TAROX and Vestel SLIC's
 * Added Positivo and Kraftway Home Basic serials
 * Enhanced the installation of GRLDR
 * Enhanced the dump option so that it will now dump the certificate and serial as well as the SLIC
 * Other minor tweaks and fixes
 



scand with Virustotal


 <a href="
http://www.virustotal.com/file-scan/report.html?id=22e65443e3c41cacff1ab693c796f57477d91b9210fa96a9eea9a310e362f2bb-1305111938" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">

About
 
This is the loader application that's used by millions of people worldwide, well known for passing Microsoft's WAT (Windows Activation Technologies) and is arguably the safest Windows activation exploit ever created. The application itself injects a SLIC (System Licensed Internal Code) into your system before Windows boots; this is what fools Windows into thinking it's genuine.
